item.title: Jack Reynor Joins ‘Presumed Innocent’ Season 2 Opposite Rachel Brosnahan
item.description: “Midsommar” star Jack Reynor has joined Rachel Brosnahan in Season 2 of the Apple TV+ legal thriller “Presumed Innocent.” The next installment of the series is based on Jo Murr
